page.title: 02Our School in 1985
page.content: Our school is a junior school.We are in it for four years.School starts at eight fifty five a.m. and finishes at three thirty p.m.We have a break in the morning which lasts for ten minutes. Our dinner break lasts for one hour and twenty minutes.We have assembly first thing in the morning. We have different clubs like Recorder,Gym,Football,Cello and Violin, Pottery,Netball,Choir,Country dancing Cricket and Athletics. Our lessons include Maths, English,R.E.,P.E.,History,Science,Craft and sewing.We sit two to a desk.Sometimes we get stars or sweets if we do our work well.Our uniform is a red jumper a white or grey shirt,black or grey bottoms and a red tie.We have about ten teachers, one for each class.
